definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out
halo/ring of light around the sun or moon

sentences.english: A similar Moon Halo may be visible during the night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚有時也能看見類似的月暈。

sentences.english: A luminous spot on a lunar halo.
sentences.chinese: 幻月，假月月暈上的光斑。

sentences.english: I have seen one before that encircled the moon with a very clear gap.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經就看到過類似的月暈，帶有很明顯的一個缺口。

sentences.english: Halo around the sun or moon , rain or snowsoon.
sentences.chinese: 日暈三更雨，月暈午時風。
